title: Low Priority
body: This is so stupid my power cord got unplugged while i was in a ranked match and i tried to reconnect and got back in the game before it ended and we still won the game....but oh look when i get out of the game it says im in low priority because of afk and this is not the first time this has happened to me honestly. this shit happened to me before and i just got the notification saying my account has been doing better with leaving games and whatever and 1 game my power cord turns off and im in low priority this shit is fuckin stupid man nobody is even gonna read this thread but i mean isnt there a way to show if someone is just afking in games or is actually having computer problems at this moment riot is just like nah kid you afk lmao banned. i know your making mad money off this game and couldnt actually give a shit about small problems like this but damn riot this shit is r%%%%%ed.

replies.body:
I believe I can help shed some light on why you faced this punishment.  Our Leaverbuster system works on a sort of level system.  Everyone starts off at Level 0,  and if you do leave a game, no punishments are given to you because we know that shit happens sometimes.  However, if you continue to leave games, your level can increase higher and higher.  If it gets to a certain point, even a single leave will levy penalties against your account.

This doesn't mean you are stuck here forever.  The longer you play without leaving any games, your Leaver Level will eventually start to decay, and will eventually  hit zero once more.

The best advice I can offer is to keep playing without leaving, and you shouldn't experience immediate penalties in the future if something out of your control happens.
